meanings.sent1: The unexpected rain caught us off guard.
meanings.sent2: The surprise party was truly unexpected.
meanings.sent3: It was unexpected to see a penguin in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected visitor brought joy to our home.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected twist in the story left us in awe.

meanings.definition: Happening or coming without warning or preparation.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected phone call interrupted our dinner.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected snowstorm caused chaos on the roads.
meanings.sent3: She had an unexpected talent for juggling oranges.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected turn of events left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected arrival of the package made her day.
